query: How is my portfolio performing today?

tool_definitions.name: PortfolioAnalysisTool
tool_definitions.description: Analyzes portfolio holdings for a specific date, calculating total value, asset allocation, and performance metrics

valuationDate.description: Date for analysis (YYYY-MM-DD format or relative terms like 'today', 'yesterday')

tool_definitions.name: PortfolioComparisonTool
tool_definitions.description: Compares portfolio performance between two different dates

currentDate.description: Current date for comparison (YYYY-MM-DD or relative terms)

comparisonDate.description: Historical date to compare against (YYYY-MM-DD or relative terms)

tool_definitions.name: MarketIntelligenceTool
tool_definitions.description: Provides market sentiment analysis and intelligence for specific securities
